alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 10:13AM CDT until August 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of West Tennessee, including the following counties, Carroll, Crockett, Gibson, Henderson and Madison. * WHEN...Until 415 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1013 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, Lexington, Trenton, Fairview, Three Way, Atwood, Blue Goose, Bargerton, Carroll, Medina, Gibson, McLemoresville, Lavinia, Goat City, West, Sitka, Hickory Flat and Claybrook. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
